com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.commands.factories

Class ContextMenuCommandFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.commands.factories.ContextMenuCommandFactory

  • public class ContextMenuCommandFactory
extends Object
    The ContextMenuCommandFactory is used for creating commands for the context menu. It is used by ContextMenuCommandListFactory.
